text: The Prince and the Pauper (German: Prinz und Bettelknabe) is a 1920 Austrian adventure movie directed by Alexander Korda and based on the 1881 novel of the same name by Mark Twain. It stars Tibor Lubinszky, Franz Herterich, Albert Schreiber, Adolf Weisse and was distributed by UFA. ==Other websites== * Category:1920 adventure movies Category:Austrian adventure movies Category:Austrian silent movies Category:Movies directed by Alexander Korda Category:Movies based on books
title: The Prince and the Pauper (1920 movie)
